home.title: Edu-GRIT
home.subtitle: AI Platform for Student Grit Analysis
home.description: AI-based system for measuring and tracking student grit (perseverance and resilience) through text analysis and surveys.

features.title: Key Features
features.aiDescription: Advanced AI technology for analyzing student grit levels
features.roleBasedDescription: Secure access system based on user roles
features.realTimeDescription: Real-time dashboard for monitoring and analysis

survey.title: GRIT Survey
survey.description: Answer the following questions honestly and in detail to analyze your grit level.

questions.q1: What motivates you to persist in your studies?
questions.q2: Tell us about an experience when you almost gave up but continued.
questions.q3: How do you overcome failures or challenges in learning?
questions.q4: What keeps you focused on long-term goals?

survey.alreadySubmitted: You have already submitted a survey for this semester

aspirations.title: Student Aspirations
aspirations.placeholder: Write your aspirations or feedback here...

result.title: Grit Analysis Result
result.subtitle: Here is an in-depth analysis of your grit level
result.interpretationText: These keywords indicate the mindset and motivation identified in your responses. They help understand the most prominent aspects of grit.

intervention.high: Excellent grit level! Continue current strategies and consider mentoring other students.
intervention.moderate: Good grit level. Focus on maintaining motivation and setting clear goals.
intervention.low: Consider seeking academic counseling and developing resilience strategies.

footer.description: AI-based platform for analyzing student grit levels and providing personalized recommendations.

about.title: About Edu-GRIT
about.subtitle: AI platform for analyzing student grit levels
about.mission1: Edu-GRIT is an innovative platform that uses Artificial Intelligence (AI) technology to analyze student grit levels through text analysis. Grit, which consists of perseverance and passion, is a key factor in academic and life success.
about.mission2: This platform is designed to help educational institutions understand and support student grit development, enabling targeted interventions to improve learning quality and student well-being.
about.sdg3Desc: Edu-GRIT supports student mental health by identifying those who need psychological support and providing appropriate intervention recommendations.
about.sdg4Desc: This platform improves education quality by providing deep insights into student motivation and perseverance, enabling more personalized learning approaches.
about.techAIDesc: Natural Language Processing for text analysis
about.techVizDesc: Interactive charts and graphs for insights
about.contactDesc: For questions, suggestions, or collaboration related to Edu-GRIT, please contact:
about.contactFeedback: We would love to hear feedback and innovative ideas for the development of this platform.
